p: COVID-19 is the disease caused by a novel betacoronavirus, the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV2). The disease was first reported in December 2019 Wuhan, China [1] and the full genome was sequenced and published by January 05, 2020 [2]. By March 11, 2020, COVID-19 had spread globally and was declared a pandemic, with, at the time of writing, June 6 th 2020, there has been over 6 million people infected and 380,000 deaths [3].
